meanings.definition: A person new to or inexperienced in a field or activity.
meanings.sent1: The novice asked many questions during the training session.
meanings.sent2: She is a novice at playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The novice chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: As a novice in the art of painting, she struggled to mix colors effectively.
meanings.sent5: The novice gardener eagerly planted her first seeds in the soil.

meanings.definition: A beginner or someone who is just starting out.
meanings.sent1: The young novice was excited to learn a new skill.
meanings.sent2: He is a novice in the world of photography.
meanings.sent3: The novice swimmer wore floaties in the deep end of the pool.
meanings.sent4: Like a novice hiker, she took small steps up the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent5: The novice dancer stumbled a bit during her first performance on stage.
